item.title: In the beginning there was the command line
item.description: bootleg writing-sample Interesting blogpost from Adam Elkus about a sort of interface conservatism that arises in defense of command lines contra the GUI and in defense now of linear timeline feeds vs algorithmic curation.

item.title: Mark I Fire Control Computer
item.description: Excerpted from Wikipedia bootleg The Mark 1, and later the Mark 1A, Fire Control Computer was a component of the Mark 37 Gun Fire Control System deployed by the United States Navy during World War II and up to 1991 and possibly later.

item.title: Research is not a jack in the box
item.description: blog-idea Talking about the “crank turning” model of research and the problems that this attitude will cause in young researchers.
